Name: Adventure of Great Wolf
About the game: (original name: fäkhäßk«>fäbük, all rights have been given to Claudius Kigfron to release this game and accompanying soundtrack as well as any assets from either) This is a port of a game that a friend gave me from läkzänaudät (approx eng: programming language computer) to Windows using Unity3d. The original game was written in v«kän (Vexen) but I have used various translation scripts to translate the game into English. I've posted this on Steam so that people may enjoy a classical Vexen game which entertained many back in v«kka firlän I (Vexka Island 1). More information regarding the games origins as well as the porting process are available on my blog: Adventure of Great Wolf (fäkhäßk's adventure might be a better translation) (eng) A game created by Fäkhäßk the 2nd. This game accompanies fäkhäßk«>fäkärkatl«id (eng: fäkhäßk's universe music, the soundtrack for this game). Together, they create a great feeling. They will think much but feel soothed with the nice nostalgia-ish music. (note: the closest english translation for ä«kämlük is nostalgia) The game supports foreign languages with a many-language-device, but the game does not include a many-language-device. created by fäk häßk II on 10th april 1572 (april 20th, 1572 in the Gregorian Calendar) (v«k) käm ßpy vonay fäkhäßkay IIay makä«k\ dß ßpy fäkhäßk«>fäkärkatl«id bitn mit nikt tämut kävn\ lz fäk fä«iln ziml\ dän unday fänä ä«kämlüknfülnä l«idä känß dänktänt tämutänt audätänt\ dä ßpy andrakaä känß mäkvuränt mit käm tämutkagäryt, abär dä spy käm tämutkagäryt nikthäp\ mäkßpy fäk häßk II kvn «täk apräßmänd MDL««II I apologize if any translations are incorrect or sound weird, I am not skilled in the Vexen language.
